mapper.select: select a.id ,a.name ,a.phone ,b.regdate ,b.in_time ,b.out_time ,b.attendance_status from member a, attendance b where a.authority='ROLE_TEACHER' and b.id=a.id and to_char(b.regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(to_date(sysdate), 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by b.in_time desc
select * from pacounselt where pc_code is not null and status='0' order by meetdate desc

select rownum ,cntno ,regdate ,memcnt from membercnt
where rownum <= 12
order by regdate

select count(*) as cnt, c.subdetail_name from class a, class_ing b, subdetail c where a.class_code = b.class_code and c.subdetail_code = a.subdetail_code and a.subdetail_code=#{subdetailCode} group by c.subdetail_name

select count(*) as cnt, b.school_name ,b.school_code from member a, school_detail b where a.school_code = b.school_code and b.school_code=#{schoolCode} and AUTHORITY='ROLE_STUDENT' group by b.school_name, b.school_code
